flavorText: "Be sure to get the tree in the picture."
name: Selfie Preservation
originalText: Search your library for a basic land card and reveal it. If there's a tree in its art, put it onto the battlefield tapped. Otherwise, put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: The tree doesn’t have to be alive, but it must be recognizably tree-shaped. Wooden structures that were once trees don’t count.
Stumps don’t count. They’re like the absence of trees.

text: Search your library for a basic land card and reveal it. If there's a tree in its art, put it onto the battlefield tapped. Otherwise, put it into your hand. Then shuffle.
